problem_names:
lemma restricted_of_simple_Some: 
  "restricted_of_simple x = Some r \<Longrightarrow> base r = x"
translations:
lemma restricted_of_simple_Some: 
  "restricted_of_simple x = Some r \<Longrightarrow> base r = x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. restricted_of_simple x = Some r \<Longrightarrow> base r = x

proof (prove)
using this:
  map_option base (restricted_of_simple x) =
  (if x \<in> {0, 2, 4, 6} then Some x else None)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. restricted_of_simple x = Some r \<Longrightarrow> base r = x

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>restricted_of_simple x = Some r; x \<in> {0, 2, 4, 6};
     map_option base (restricted_of_simple x) = Some x\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> base r = x
 2. \<lbrakk>restricted_of_simple x = Some r; x \<notin> {0, 2, 4, 6};
     map_option base (restricted_of_simple x) = None\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> base r = x
